long_description: The REI Mini MultiTowel brings high absorbency and quick drying to your lightweight backpacking trips. Ultralight microfiber woven polyester/nylon fabric absorbs 3 times its weight in water and wrings out almost completely dry. At 15.5 x 15.5 in., the towel is sized perfectly for use as a face-, hand- or dishtowel. The REI Mini MultiTowel comes in a small carry pouch with a small plastic carabiner so you can clip the towel to a backpack. Towel weighs only 0.8 oz. with the carry pouch, and 0.6 oz. without.
short_description: The REI Mini MultiTowel brings high absorbency and quick drying to your lightweight backpacking trips.
